title: Permabanned ?
body:
Game 1
Pre-Game
BeerBêlly: adc
In-Game
BeerBêlly: pls dont take my farm
BeerBêlly: i will afk
BeerBêlly: obv i can tell ur toxic
BeerBêlly: gg
BeerBêlly: if only you guys didint int in the begiinning
BeerBêlly: why do i expect people not to int
BeerBêlly: thats all they know how to do
BeerBêlly: when you have flash but die to an invade
BeerBêlly: when ur so tryhard you play poppy
BeerBêlly: and ur muted
BeerBêlly: how long till you get a 10th acct
BeerBêlly: soince i have no support
BeerBêlly: this game is over
BeerBêlly: gg
BeerBêlly: no one can play a supprot
BeerBêlly: apparently
BeerBêlly: only trolls
BeerBêlly: oops
BeerBêlly: report me cause i get trolled bot
BeerBêlly: ok
BeerBêlly: im not 1v2ing bot
BeerBêlly: hes not a support
BeerBêlly: and thats not toxic
BeerBêlly: LOL
BeerBêlly: yeah you troll and have 9 accts banned
BeerBêlly: adc is a shit position enough as it is
BeerBêlly: when you dont have a support
BeerBêlly: its not even fair to me
BeerBêlly: why because i die to the fed poppy
BeerBêlly: you guys inted in the beginning and then i have 3 bot and they gangbang me while i hjave no help
BeerBêlly: ok
BeerBêlly: nah im fine
BeerBêlly: no
BeerBêlly: thats toxic
BeerBêlly: im just tired of having troll supports
BeerBêlly: every game
BeerBêlly: riot has legit said singed support
BeerBêlly: is banned worthy
BeerBêlly: now you want help mid
BeerBêlly: cmon now
BeerBêlly: singed takes farm and doesnt have support item
BeerBêlly: why would i lose money and lane for no reason
BeerBêlly: dpown 4 kill
BeerBêlly: donw 2 kill
BeerBêlly: have fun making a new acct
BeerBêlly: yo useem good at that
BeerBêlly: we pinged you
BeerBêlly: ?
BeerBêlly: bait
BeerBêlly: nvm
BeerBêlly: ?
BeerBêlly: it was 2 people
BeerBêlly: wyd
BeerBêlly: i am playing the gam
BeerBêlly: you cant win that fight
BeerBêlly: dont blame me
BeerBêlly: no ur not
BeerBêlly: riven is fed
BeerBêlly: not oyu
BeerBêlly: no ur not
BeerBêlly: then whyd you get one shot
BeerBêlly: you walked into 4 people
BeerBêlly: with just singed at half hp
BeerBêlly: i killed riven
BeerBêlly: have more cs than top
BeerBêlly: and same as mid
BeerBêlly: how are you flaming ,me
BeerBêlly: nice grammar
BeerBêlly: i love how you guyus are blaming me
BeerBêlly: when its not my fault
BeerBêlly: i didnt feed anyone
BeerBêlly: and i am streonger than sivir
BeerBêlly: not my fault you lost top lane
BeerBêlly: you cant even speak englsih
BeerBêlly: lol
BeerBêlly: yeah talk in letters
BeerBêlly: since you cant in word
BeerBêlly: 17 doesnt mean jack when he ints
BeerBêlly: ok
BeerBêlly: you guys choose bad fights
BeerBêlly: and get mad
BeerBêlly: lol
BeerBêlly: gg
Post-Game
BeerBêlly: time to report
BeerBêlly: a bunch of people this game
BeerBêlly: when ur lvl 17
BeerBêlly: but do no dmg all game
BeerBêlly: and flame me
BeerBêlly: UDYRS FLAMING ME
BeerBêlly: WHEN HE LITERALLY TRIES TO 1V5
BeerBêlly: ALL GGAME
BeerBêlly: lol
BeerBêlly: im not getting banned
BeerBêlly: you are sivir
BeerBêlly: you told me to die
BeerBêlly: thats ban worthy
BeerBêlly: i said nothing all game
BeerBêlly: you guys are just making it easy
BeerBêlly: to ban you
BeerBêlly: yeah report me
BeerBêlly: i did nothing wrong
BeerBêlly: what did i do?
BeerBêlly: addf me
BeerBêlly: add me
BeerBêlly: so you can see me get banned
BeerBêlly: youre actually gonna be banned you wish death upon someone
BeerBêlly: what support
BeerBêlly: i see no one on my team
BeerBêlly: who is a support
BeerBêlly: do you
BeerBêlly: ok
BeerBêlly: yeah with a support item
BeerBêlly: i had a cs stealing singed
BeerBêlly: no you just tell people to die
BeerBêlly: you are better
BeerBêlly: lol
BeerBêlly: ok
BeerBêlly: ok i reported about 7 people
BeerBêlly: who were saying a bunch of toxic remarks
BeerBêlly: i can guarentee one of them will be banned

People were flaming me all game, wished death upon me etc. I had a singed "support" who took farm and didnt build support item. I went 4-4 i think and had a solid 140 ish cs or something. Why am I permabanned?

replies.body:
Locking this post, as the OP has made it clear he's unwilling to listen to any criticism of his logs.

If you have any questions about this moderation, feel free to reach out to us in the [Boards Discord](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification).

> [{quoted}](name=BeerBêlly,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ALQ3Obyh,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-12-23T04:48:07.167+0000)
> 
> People were flaming me all game, wished death upon me etc. I had a singed "support" who took farm and didnt build support item. 

You don't get permabanned for what other people do.

> I went 4-4 i think and had a solid 140 ish cs or something.

You don't get permabanned for not farming enough.

> Why am I permabanned?

You get permabanned for breaking the rules several times until your account is on thin ice, and then proceeding to constantly argue, call for reports, announce that you're reporting, insult people's English, constantly harass people by saying they're going to get banned, etc., like this:

> BeerBêlly: i will afk
> BeerBêlly: obv i can tell ur toxic
> BeerBêlly: gg
> BeerBêlly: if only you guys didint int in the begiinning
> BeerBêlly: why do i expect people not to int
> BeerBêlly: thats all they know how to do
> BeerBêlly: when you have flash but die to an invade
> BeerBêlly: when ur so tryhard you play poppy
> BeerBêlly: and ur muted
> BeerBêlly: how long till you get a 10th acct
> BeerBêlly: soince i have no support
> BeerBêlly: this game is over
> BeerBêlly: gg
> BeerBêlly: no one can play a supprot
> BeerBêlly: apparently
> BeerBêlly: only trolls
> BeerBêlly: oops
> BeerBêlly: report me cause i get trolled bot
> BeerBêlly: thats toxic
> BeerBêlly: im just tired of having troll supports
> BeerBêlly: you cant even speak englsih
> BeerBêlly: lol
> BeerBêlly: yeah talk in letters
> BeerBêlly: since you cant in word
> BeerBêlly: time to report
> BeerBêlly: a bunch of people this game
> BeerBêlly: lol
> BeerBêlly: im not getting banned
> BeerBêlly: you are sivir
> BeerBêlly: add me
> BeerBêlly: so you can see me get banned
> BeerBêlly: ok i reported about 7 people
> BeerBêlly: who were saying a bunch of toxic remarks
> BeerBêlly: i can guarentee one of them will be banned
Again, other people don't matter. Your punishment is based on your behavior. Everyone is subject to the same rules.

that's not true at all, people have gotten special permissions plenty of times. another sheep following riot blindly i see, you don't even play league anymore and you are trying to act like you are better than people. How is that punishment fit for what I said, go play league again oh wait you probably quit because you were actually flamed and harrassed by real insults and threats. I love how everyone who has commented on this forum doesn't even play the game.

Show me any example of someone getting special permissions from Riot to avoid a punishment?

And btw, i literally just use this account on the boards because I built up a rapport with it before switching back to my account from season 2. I have two active accounts and if I actually wanted to play on this one I would. But I made the name for this account while drunk and really have no reason as my main account's name is much better.
Uh the face of League at the moment idk TYLER1,, who else gross gore, jensen, plenty of pro players have been toxic but get their accounts unbanned. When they have said way worse shit.

He was subject to a ban above and beyond a permanent ban. He was subject to an **extremely** rare and severe ban called an "ID ban" which prevented him from creating any new accounts. Any new account he would create would be permanently banned immediately when it was discovered. He had that ban lifted as Riot has a policy in place for players with an ID ban to get it lifted.

He did not get any of his permanently banned accounts reinstated. Permanent account bans are permanent for everyone, including Tyler1. His ID ban being removed meant he could create a new account without it being permanently banned. It does not mean any of his accounts were ever unbanned.

I know the history please stop patronizing me and acting like you are better than me. I do not deserve to be premanently banned based of the report that is given. I love how a computer perma bans me for no reason, except for looking at a few keywords. If you honestly think I deserve a perma ban from that chat log, then I lost hope you are a fucking idiot. See now that's actually toxic. Don't bother replying I'm done trying to get through to your dumbass who doesn't even play the game.

You say you're "done being civilized", but you weren't even civilized here.

You flamed all game, yet you think you don't deserve punishment.

****
You're right that this one log does not merit a permanent ban. However, you were given multiple warnings to change your behavior and you refused to. Thus, Riot is telling you that they do not want you to play this game. You refuse to behave appropriately. How many chances does it take?

I have read every comment you have posted.

You did not go "months". You play on this account less than half the month in days, and you average maybe one game a day over the months since your ban. Why would you expect your punishment to decay when you hardly ever play this game **AND** you don't even improve your behavior.

This punishment wasn't from one "bad game". This punishment is because you had **multiple** bad games, were given a final warning, and then allowed yourself to have more "bad games". That is indicative of a problem with your attitude - not a problem with the system. Riot gave you chances. You didn't use those chances to improve your behavior.

For over 90% of players, a "bad game" does not result in the level of flaming and harassment present in this chat log.

> [{quoted}](name=BeerBêlly,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ALQ3Obyh,comment-id=000200010000000100000000000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2018-12-23T06:29:38.717+0000)
>
> You dont play this game, Dont talk to me like you know shit.

Except I actually do? Just not on this account?

>I can play 10 games in a day and 9 out of those 10 games there will be flaming and toxicity worse than anything I said in that log.

Yet most other players see this toxicity in maybe one or two games per week? You're not special.

>you literally are an idiot. Thats real flame I will keep insulting you because you are actually a dumbass. Stop defending riots shitty ass company

So you think that flaming after a permanent ban is going to show people that you're right? If anything, it shows that your ban was more than legitimate and more than necessary.

> 
> https://www.google.com/search?q=riot+sexual+harassment&rlz=1C1CHBF_enUS748US748&oq=riot+&aqs=chrome.0.69i59j69i57j69i60l2j0j69i61.946j0j7&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8
> *snip*

How does Riot's workplace environment relate to your in game suspension?

It's as if you used one workplace violence claim at McDonalds (of which there have been many) to contest them banning you for being an asshole of a customer. It doesn't justify your actions at all.
In the future, when someone's behavior is this bad, just report the post and disengage from the conversation.

Why do you think this sort of thing is okay? Like honestly?

Flaming does nothing. You just got permanently banned because of it. Do you really think this is somehow a way to go about life? Flaming anyone you disagree with?

Ah I see you even have defended people banning champs that your teammate has hovered. I love how you support actual toxic people. You are a joke. I'm done being civilized if riot treats me like a perma banner its time to be one
that's not true at all, people have gotten special permissions plenty of times. another sheep following riot blindly i see
How long ago did you receive your 14 day suspension?
i honestly have no idea. It's been a while i think i have no clue
Well, in your 14 day suspension’s reform card, it told you any additional toxicity going forward could result in a ban. That was definitely a toxic chat. Sorry, man =\
thats pathetic, its been months since that and one fucking game gets me perma banned. Riot wonders why this shit game is dying. Good riddance i cant wait for this game to be non-existent
Punishments do not get forgiven with time **unless** you also improve your behavior, which you obviously didn't.
yeah i was so uncalled for, for what i said, asking to report someone who told me they wish i would die
this was the only game in the ban log or whatever. and i got trolled
